text.text: {@sys_rop1=TWRP can leave your system partition unmodified}
{@sys_rop2=to make it easier for you to take official updates.}
{@sys_rop3=TWRP will be unable to prevent the stock ROM from}
{@sys_rop4=replacing TWRP and will not offer to root your device.}
{@sys_rop5=Installing zips or performing adb operations may still}

checkbox.text: {@sys_ro_never_show_chk=Never show this screen during boot again}
